title: Tickets Nov 11: The Stifling of Free Speech on College Campuses
description:
Tickets available at: https://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/3079350

This panel discussion is Nov 11 at 1:00 pm at the Canada Christian College, 50 Gervais Drive, Toronto, Ontario M3C 1Z3.

Organizer and Host: Ms. Sarina Singh, former social worker, political and social commentator: You can find out more about her and her views and work at Recovering Social Worker on YouTube: (http://bit.ly/2zljgBU).

Panelists include me, as well as Dr. Gad Saad and Dr. Oren Amitay.

Dr. Gad Saad: Dr Saad is a professor at Concordia University in Montreal, host of the influential YouTube channel The Saad Truth ((http://bit.ly/1qDQIYh)) and author of The Consuming Instinct (http://amzn.to/2zltuQ7), The Evolutionary Bases of Consumption (http://amzn.to/2haBjQv) as well as editor of Evolutionary Psychology in the Business Sciences.

Dr. Oren Amitay (www.docamitay.com) is a clinical psychologist, media consultant, lecturer at Ryerson University in Toronto, host of the podcast The Real Reality (http://docamitay.com/the-real-reality-podcast/). I was invited by Dr. Amitay to talk to his class at Ryerson about 8 months ago. That talk, An Incendiary  Discussion at Ryerson U, was recorded (http://bit.ly/2hhV78j) and has since garnered about 400,000 views. 

If you plan to attend, please don't bring large bags or packsacks, as security concerns make it imperative to search attendees. 

Finally, keep your cool, regardless of provocation. Everything that happens at this event will be made intensely public, and we don't want anyone hurt, or for anything foolish to occur. Thanks.
